com.rdio.android.api
Interface RdioListener

public interface RdioListener

A callback listener for the Rdio SDK.

Method Summary
 void onRdioAuthorised(java.lang.String accessToken, java.lang.String accessTokenSecret)
          Called when a new access token & access token secret have been set.
 void onRdioReady()
          Called on the main thread when the Rdio API finishes initializing.
 void onRdioUserAppApprovalNeeded(android.content.Intent authorisationIntent)
          Called when your app doesn't provide an access token or access token secret.
 void onRdioUserPlayingElsewhere()
          Called on the main thread when the player determines that the current user is also playing from another location.
 

Method Detail

onRdioReady

void onRdioReady()
Called on the main thread when the Rdio API finishes initializing. Before playback is possible the state of the current user must be established, which requires IPC calls and/or network requests. If the app is already authorised (i.e. cached access token & secret were provided to the Rdio object), then the 'authorised' parameter will be passed as true.

NOTE: May be called more than once, if the user's state changes.

onRdioUserPlayingElsewhere

void onRdioUserPlayingElsewhere()
Called on the main thread when the player determines that the current user is also playing from another location. In this case you must stop playback and warn the user.

onRdioUserAppApprovalNeeded

void onRdioUserAppApprovalNeeded(android.content.Intent authorisationIntent)
Called when your app doesn't provide an access token or access token secret. Your app will need to fire the authorisationIntent which will call through to the Rdio app to prompt the user to authorise your application.

Parameters:
authorisationIntent - An Intent which should be launched via startActivityForResult() at an appropriate time

onRdioAuthorised

void onRdioAuthorised(java.lang.String accessToken,
                      java.lang.String accessTokenSecret)
Called when a new access token & access token secret have been set. Listeners should then save/cache these credentials

Parameters:
accessToken - A user access token
accessTokenSecret - A user access secret
